```{r}
library(EBImage)
```

## Simple white circle

```{r, fig.width=4, fig.height=4}
x <- matrix(0, nrow=300, ncol=300)
y <- drawCircle(x, 100, 200, 47, col=1)
display(y)
```
  
## Simple filled yellow circle

```{r, fig.width=4, fig.height=4}
x <- channel(y, 'rgb')
y <- drawCircle(x, 200, 140, 57, col='yellow', fill=TRUE)
display(y)
```
